short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record voice messages and send them in Slack!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With slack we can send text, images, files among other things, but not audios ... Until now! Using this extension, another option is added in the chats, a microphone button which can be used to send audios through slack!

Once this extension is installed, a new button with a microphone icon will be added to the message bar in Slack. Just click the button with a microphone and record your voice message!

After, drag & drop downloaded audio file into a dialog in Slack and you are ready to send message!

Your recordings aren't sent anywhere and are only stored locally on your machine.
